- Check for new error message displayed on the Import Feedback dialog
- Proper error bacon bar on top
Successful Import Receipt: ‘Import Completed’ message on bacon bar (Yellow)
Notes:
File Import Receipt Overview: Lucid Chart

SS-37890

Test Case(s): Successful Import Receipt: Bacon bar should disappear after few seconds
Failed Import Receipt: ‘Errors with file import 'Click to view import errors’ X’ message on Bacon bar (Red)
Notes: Message changed from "File Import Failed" to "Errors with file import"

Test Case(s): Failed Import Receipt: Bacon bar should not disappear until user clicks on the ‘X’ icon
Failed Import Receipt: Clicking on ‘Click to view import errors’ should open up an ‘Import Feedback’ dialog with the results

Import Feedback Dialog
Header: 'Import Feedback' label
Body:
    - Import Failed with following message: 'The following structures were not imported due to errors in the file, please correct the errors and try again.'
    - Table with three columns ‘ENTRY’; ‘SMILES/ID’; ‘MESSAGE’ (visible based on the error type)
Footer:
    - Download Report (visible based on the error type)
    - Working OK button

Import Feedback Dialog
Clicking on 'Download Report' button exports the table into CSV file
- Entry count on the table should match the row count on the import file
- Check the contents of the downloaded report as csv comparing with the actual table
File Size Error: >200MB throws a generic error dialog with following message: 'The maximum upload file size is 200MB; Upload smaller partitions of the file'
Data Error: Duplicate headers in file throws generic error dialog with following message: 'Duplicate Header column names found - <column_name>'

Data Error: Blank column headers in file throws generic error dialog with following message: 'The column header in positions [<indexes>] has a blank title, please ensure all columns have a unique title.'
Data Error: Import with invalid identifier columns
Data Error: Invalid SDF properties
Data Error: Column header with special characters (#, _, etc.,)
Data Error: Long header names
ID Error: Missing IDs in the file - 'ID missing for the compound'
ID Error: Spaced IDs/Non-existing IDs - 'ID does not exist in LiveDesign database'
ID Error: Long IDs - three elipses at the end of the ID on the table (overflow-wrap)
ID Error: GE IDs - Generic Error dialog with error 'ID not existing'

Timeout Error: 300 seconds limit. Post that throws a generic dialog with following message: 
'Import timed out.
Try again or upload smaller partitions of the file'
Structural Error: MAE failure - Generic error dialog with following message 'Unable to Import Maestro Data'

Structural Error: 
Errors known from core suites: (Testing any one of the below except top 2 should be okay)
- Modified/Invalid Atom: 'Structure could not be standardized'
- Missing SMILES: 'SMILES missing for the compound'
- Atoms Size (Requires pre-preocessor change): '<import_atom_size> atoms present; exceeds <FF_set_size> atom limit'
- Query bond: 'Bond Query Feature Found'
- Variable attachment bond: 'Variable Attachment bond found'
- R-group atom: 'Atom with R Label found'
- Any query atom: 'Atom Query feature found'
- No atoms (SDF with GE row): 'No atoms present'
- kekulize 'c1ccnc1': 'Can't kekulize mol. Unkekulized atoms: <atom_numbers>'
Notes: Try also testing with different type of structures known to trigger error from core suites
